name: Cafe Battle
description:
Café Battle – Battle with your friends & family and have fun!

Hanging out with your friends but don’t know what to do? Café Battle is a cute, but exciting game for 2 players. In this game, there are two adorable witches who want to own their Café. Your tasks are to align with the cute witches, battle your friends & family, and acquire customers as many as possible to win! Swipe your finger to hurl magic balls and leverage 10 unique magic spells to battle your friends & family and to acquire more customers! Adorable roles, exciting battles, and 2 player mode are the three reasons you should play it with your friends & family now!

[Features]

* 2 Player mode, have fun with your friends & family!
* Align with your cute witch to win the game!
* Various cool magic spells, exciting battles!
* Easy to play, but still challenging enough!
* Form a great strategy to overwhelm your friend & family!
* iPad only!
